profile.name: Hello, I'm Oscar Benites
profile.me: Passionate about mobile and desktop development

Section.AboutMe-Desc: I am a calm person, self-confident, curious by nature, self-taught, responsible and committed to my work, I am always working to improve my skills.
Section.Collaborating-Desc: I’m always open to discussing work or partnership opportunities.
